column4: hey all, sorry, my irc client died. have a full hard drive on 25 GB partition? new install, what could do this?
: nope.. did you do manual partitioning?
yes, manual partitioning
thats why so weird, all media, songs, movies, etc.. are on their own drive
wow.. that only took 15+ minutes :) I'm suprised you found my post.. how large did you make your /home?
sorry, boss keeps calling.
i had only two partitions .   /   and  /stuff    everything goes in /
how large is /stuff
stuff is the media partition  is about 211 GB
and / is 25 gigs?
yes,  root folder is 25GB
and you didn't setup a /swap?  25gigs should be plenty.. installed the system with software is around 4 gigs....
maybe 6 at the most
Oh, i did set up a swap, sorry
hey i found my full hard drive problem that we were talking about before.
what was it.?
i have a program called miro that downloads podcasts, well, it has been putting them in the .miro directory
lol.. it's typically the simplest things that mess with you.. glad you found it
yeah, before i wiped out Intrepid for the Jaunty release canidate, i thought that i had gotten that folder and saved it. It has the videos download to the big media drive i use for this.
thanks for your help about it though
np :)
no
